def priority(item: float, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """Returns priority with which we want to add item to each bin with Hybrid Best Fit strategy.
    
    This strategy combines Best Fit with a slight preference for bins that are closer to capacity.
    It aims to balance between finding the bin that leaves the least remaining space and
    promoting a more even distribution of items across bins.

    Args:
        item: Size of item to be added to the bin.
        bins: Array of capacities for each bin.

    Return:
        Array of same size as bins with priority score of each bin.
    """
